Title: vBridge
Description: vBridge extends .NET's GUI capabilities by giving developers additional system features, and increases productivity by eliminating common boilerplate code.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

vBridge extends .NET's GUI capabilities by giving developers additional system features, and increases productivity by eliminating common boilerplate code.

Note

Updates on CodePlex are postponed as vBridge is being re-built.

Features:
  • Aero
  • MVVM
  • ValueConverters
  • Global Hotkeys
  • System extension methods
  • Highly configurable
  • Very light

Documentation

ViewModelLocator Snippet

Forms Support

As it stands vBridge can be used in Windows Forms, however it has not been tested (yet?).
Either way WPF has the highest priority!

Release notes:

A binary file has been released but the project is still very immature and its alpha stage.
It is not recommended to use this binary for anything other than first impression to get a feel of vBridge.
The API may or may not change.
